name: The Elevator Game (vfqd)
description:
This week's game is my take on a two button game, where you need to control an elevator to get the patrons of your hotel to where they need to be. As before, all the art and scripting (and audio this time!) were done by one person as part of a project to make a game a week.

Music credit, however, goes to: Fahrstuhl Musik
